20.06.09.name: wordpress/toolbar-removal-completely-disable
20.06.09.description:
disable wordpress admin bar and toolbar for all users on frontend and backend with new unified coding

Disable (basic) WordPress 3.1+ (or later) Admin Bar, and WordPress 3.3+ (or later) ToolBar, frontend 28px, Bump CB, backend Admin Menu Shadow Effect, Admin Bar and ToolBar Pointer ToolTips, User Personal Options Settings, without loosing Logout and Network MultiSite functionality! This is only a "basic" (disable only) disabler. For "full" (disable and remove) removal refer to Admin Bar Removal with Add-On Admin Bar Node Removal and to ToolBar Removal with Add-On
